title: Walter Block vs. Noam Chomsky
description:
Over recent months, acclaimed professors Noam Chomsky and Walter Block have exchanged ideas via PRIMO NUTMEG. Check out the discussion on libertarian socialism and anarcho-capitalism between the authors of "Manufacturing Consent" and "Defending the Undefendable." 

Get access to the early episodes of PRIMO NUTMEG for only $1 a month on Patreon: https://patreon.com/primonutmeg

Subscribe to PRIMO NUTMEG on YouTube, SoundCloud, and iTunes!
